metadata.name: HackTool - SharpChisel Execution
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the Sharp Chisel via the commandline arguments

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sharpchisel.exe')) AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('sharpchisel'))

output.summary: Detects usage of the Sharp Chisel via the commandline arguments
